images.description: This screenshot shows the console homepage and main navigation panel. As you can see, there is a lot of content in this app! Making navigation and discoverability work well are constant struggles with any app this large.

This screenshot shows some of the other top-level panels in the app. Essentially every panel and every page are maintained by a different team within Google's massive Cloud organization, and getting them all to work together seamlessly is non-trivial!
